string.text: "Cocoon"

A formation of gravitational nature.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Fountain"

An anomaly of presumably gravitational nature with a bizarre shape.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Signet"

Some stalkers call this artefact the "Amulet". Some believe it brings good luck.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Thistle"

Quite often spawned by gravitational anomalies.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Bat"

A very beautiful abnormal formation.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Sun"

A rare specimen generating an inexhaustible source of light.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Heart"

Artefact with a bizarre shape. Its core resembles a human body.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Chain"

A very strange artefact that generates a strong gravitational field while nothing touches it.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Atom"

A rare and beautiful abnormal formation that looks like an Atom. Is a weak source of heat.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Beacon"

A clot of super dense substance containing valuable materials that are used in production.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Knot"

Created within a thermal anomaly. Has a bizarre appearance.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Scar"

Has a calming effect on the human nervous system.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Sandstone"

An artefact formed in zones with extreme temperatures. Contain trace amounts of gold.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Sourpuss"

A hollow spherical formation resembling a transparent parchment covered with a layer of film that is pleasant to the touch.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Black Angel"

A root-like artefact. When not in contact with anything, it releases steam.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Grapes"

Amber-like substance with a slight greenish hue.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Miser's Skull"

Very light and fragile artefact.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
Phantom Star

A plasma-like substance in a transparent pulsating shell.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Medal"

A small hoop with four embedded parts in a triangular shape.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Moon"

Crescent-shaped artefact. Generates a very dim light.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Generator"

Generates weak electric currents and an small electromagnetic field.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Ball"

There is no data on the conditions under which this artefact is formed but it often seems to be found near areas of increased electrical activity. Very bouncy.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Lamp"

A glowing artefact with electrical properties.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Tapeworm"

Made of pure silicon dioxide. Displays strange behaviour.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Moss"

An electric artefact that gives off a small electric buzz similar to putting your tongue on a battery.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Seraphim"

An artefact of electric nature. Generates a temporary gravitational field.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Electron"

A product of electrical anomalies.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Claw"

A beautiful glass-like formation from electrostatic anomalies.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Basilisk"

Unused...
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Helium"

A product of electrical anomalies. It gives off a gaseous substance.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Gimlet"

The bowl-shaped petals of the artefact release a powerful gaseous stimulant resulting in a positive change in human hormones.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Dragon's Eye"

Mostly found near fire anomalies with the appearance of a reptile's eye.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]cannot be placed in a container
"Eye of the Noosphere"

One of the most mysterious artefacts in the Zone, the Eye of the Noosphere can transport its wielder back in time, even to escape death. A tight squeeze of the artefact activates its ability, creating a restoration point to go back to on activation or death. Frequent use can cause the artefact to change colour, but if discharged too frequently it may cease to function altogether. The Eye gradually restores its power over time, supposedly being fueled by the anomalous energy of the Zone.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]not radioactive %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]super-artefact
